cleaned_text: - This event has passed. Anthroposophic Naturopathic Intensive Training 15 March @ 7:00 pm - 8:30 pm Event Navigation This is an online advanced training for naturopaths and integrative health professionals who wish to prescribe anthroposophic remedies. Part One 2023: Pharmacodynamics and remedies - metal, mineral, plant, animal and organ remedies. Part Two 2024: Nutrition as a healing modality for different illnesses. Part Three 2025: Anamnesis, diagnosis and the karma of Iilnesses Cost Payable as you go or as a full amount in advance $70 for qualified practitioners per webinar $50 for students per webinar $600 (discounted) and $400 (discounted) for all 9 webinars Payment details will be given upon acceptance into the Training. Date The 3rd Wednesday of every month from 7pm to 8.30pm, starting 15 March 2023 For more information Please call [Irmhild Kleinhenz](mailto:naturosophy@pm.me) or phone 0444 551 381 Endorsed by the ANG (Anthroposophic Naturopaths Guild) and ISAN (International
